title: Made in Nigeria Repo
description: A curated list of awesome tools built by Nigerians that can be used by anybody from anywhere in the world. Showcasing Nigerian talent and innovation.

title: Display Medium Posts Plugin
description: WordPress plugin that allows users to display posts from medium.com on any part of their website. Simplifies content syndication.

title: CleanRepos
description: A utility tool to help clear out multiple old, broken, uncompleted or abandoned repositories from your GitHub account. Spring cleaning for developers.

title: LaravelMP3 Plugin
description: A lightweight Laravel package for simple operations with mp3 files. Built on the getID3 library for reliable audio file manipulation.

title: Gathered for Meetups
description: An Android app that helps community members keep track of contacts and connections made at meetups. Networking made simple.

title: Frontstack Hackathon Winner
description: Winning project from Frontstack Online Hackathon. Responsive webpage built from Figma design, optimized for mobile using Cloudinary for asset management.

title: Random 48 Laws of Power
description: Chrome new tab extension that displays a random law from Robert Greene's '48 Laws of Power'. Daily wisdom for ambitious minds.

title: InstaWord Browser Extension
description: Learn new words without leaving your page. Highlight any word and get instant definitions, synonyms, and usage examples.

title: DevComm Directory
description: Directory of developers and designers interested in community activities across Nigeria. Connecting talent with opportunity. [Currently offline for strategic re-evaluation]

title: Scammr Platform
description: Crowdsourced platform for checking and reporting scams. Community-driven effort to reduce scam victims through shared knowledge and verification.

title: Devcenter Social
description: Social app for devcenter members to connect and follow each other on GitHub. Track projects and facilitate collaboration within the community.
